scripts.build: emcc -v -lm -O3 astmath/astMath/astMath.cpp asttime/astTime/astTime.cpp SGP4/SGP4/SGP4.cpp coordfk5/coordFK5/coordFK5.cpp external.cpp -o wasmmodule.mjs -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=@exported_functions -s WASM=1 -s SINGLE_FILE=1 -s TOTAL_MEMORY=24MB -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap"]' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1
scripts.build:dev: emcc -v -lm -g4 astmath/astMath/astMath.cpp asttime/astTime/astTime.cpp SGP4/SGP4/SGP4.cpp coordfk5/coordFK5/coordFK5.cpp external.cpp -o wasmmodule.mjs -s ASSERTIONS=2 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=@exported_functions -s WASM=1 -s SINGLE_FILE=1 -s TOTAL_MEMORY=24MB -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap"]' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1
scripts.build:llvm: emcc -v -fPIC -lm -O3 astmath/astMath/astMath.cpp asttime/astTime/astTime.cpp SGP4/SGP4/SGP4.cpp coordfk5/coordFK5/coordFK5.cpp external.cpp -o external.bc
scripts.build:clang++: clang++ -v -g -fPIC -lm astmath/astMath/astMath.cpp asttime/astTime/astTime.cpp SGP4/SGP4/SGP4.cpp coordfk5/coordFK5/coordFK5.cpp external.cpp -o external.o
